#Number of Endangered/Threatened Species Split by U.S. Regions | Lollipop Chart

```{r chart, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
source("chart3_leung.R")
plot_leung(endangered_v5)
```

-The purpose of this chart is to display the number of endangered and threatened  
species within each major U.S. region. From the chart, it can be seen that the  
West Coast has the most number of endangered and threatened, whereas the East Coast  
has the least.
